mod.name: Minecraft Forge
mod.description: Minecraft Forge is a modding API used by alot of mods.

mod.name: bspkrsCore
mod.description: Shared classes used in the mods maintained by bspkrs.

mod.name: AE2 Stuff
mod.description: More AE2 Stuff!

mod.name: Another One Bites The Dust
mod.description: AOBD dynamically finds all the ores and ingots added by any mod and makes them processable in IC2, EnderIO, RailCraft, Mekanism, Thermal Expansion, Thaumcraft, UltraTech, Factorization, RandomAdditions and Gany's Nether machines!

mod.name: Applied Energistics 2
mod.description: A Mod about Matter, Energy and using them to conquer the world..

mod.name: ArmorStatusHUD
mod.description: Provides a HUD with your equipped armor/item stats.

mod.name: Aroma1997Core
mod.description: This is basically a library used by most my other mods.

mod.name: AromaBackup
mod.description: This is a small Backup mod I created. All it does: Backups. It also works on clients!

mod.name: Backpack
mod.description: Provides the player with multiple, colored backpacks, which each has the space of a normal chest.

mod.name: Balkons Weapon Mod
mod.description: Balkon's Weapon Mod is a Minecraft mod by BalkondeurAlpha that adds a variety of weapons to the game.

mod.name: Baubles
mod.description: Adding a touch of bling to Minecraft

mod.name: BD Lib
mod.description: This is a collection of generic code used by bdew's other mods

mod.name: Better Title Screen
mod.description: Better Title Screen is a client-side mod that provides options to customize Minecraft's title screen.

mod.name: BiblioCraft
mod.description: BiblioCraft adds fancy storage containers including bookcases, armor stands, potion shelves, regular shelves, tool racks, glass weapon cases, wooden desks and wooden chest labels and now add machines, redstone interactions, and eyeware, fancy lamps and golden lanterns. Also Tables, enchanted plates, map frames, and seats!

mod.name: BiblioWoods Forestry Edition
mod.description: Adds support for 24 varietys of wood from Forestry for 8 of the wooden block in BiblioCraft.

mod.name: Big Reactors
mod.description: Adds large, multiblock power generation machines to Minecraft. Compatible with Redstone Flux (RF) power.

mod.name: Blood Magic: Alchemical Wizardry
mod.description: Rituals, spells, and more!

mod.name: Botania
mod.description: Botania is a mod that adds nature magic to Minecraft.

mod.name: BuildCraft
mod.description: In BuildCraft, there are a variety of machines that can be used to automate processes. They all require BuildCraft power to function, provided by one or more engines.

mod.name: BuildCraft Compat
mod.description: Compatibility add-on for BuildCraft

mod.name: Carpenter's Blocks
mod.description: Adds slopes and a variety of vanilla-inspired blocks that support covers, side covers, overlays, dyes and chiseled patterns.

mod.name: ChickenChunks
mod.description: Advanced chunkloading management

mod.name: Chisel 2
mod.description: A mod that adds in many fancy blocks for decoration, which are crafted utilising the Chisel.

mod.name: CodeChickenCore
mod.description: Core library for all ChickenBones mods

mod.name: CodeChickenLib
mod.description: Needed for ChickenBones mods

mod.name: CoFH Core
mod.description: CoFH Core Module

mod.name: CoFH Lib
mod.description: CoFH Libraries Module

mod.name: ComputerCraft
mod.description: ComputerCraft adds Computers, Programming and Robotics to Minecraft.

mod.name: CoroUtil
mod.description: Main Util mod with all the fixin's

mod.name: D3Core
mod.description: DoubleDoor Development Core

mod.name: Damage Indicators
mod.description: Displays the damage you inflict on creatures, as well as current health, name and potion effects.

mod.name: Dense Ores
mod.description: Adds new ore variants to the game

mod.name: EiraIRC
mod.description: An IRC Connector that works both on clients and servers independently, with some community-friendly extra features.

mod.name: EJML
mod.description: IC2 Libraries

mod.name: Enchanting Plus
mod.description: Provides an alternative way to enchant your items!

mod.name: Ender IO
mod.description: Compact conduits, painted things and access to your stuff through an eye of ender.

mod.name: Ender Storage
mod.description: EnderStorage is a mod that offers a means to store your items in The END, causing them to be everywhere and nowhere at the same time. All EnderStorage makes use of the magic of colors to link storage with its little piece of The END. Any EnderStorage with the same color code share inventory (even across dimensions).

mod.name: EnderTech
mod.description: Ender themed technological expansion.

mod.name: Ender Zoo
mod.description: More Mobs

mod.name: Equivalent Exchange 3
mod.description: Transmute stuff into other stuff! Become a Minecraft God!

mod.name: Extra Utilities
mod.description: Just a bunch of fairly useful things

mod.name: FastCraft
mod.description: FastCraft optimizes MineCraft in various ways, visit the homepage for further details and support.

mod.name: Forestry for Minecraft
mod.description: Trees, bees and more.

mod.name: Forge Multipart
mod.description: Open source library for facilitation of multiple functional parts in the one block space.

mod.name: Funky Locomotion
mod.description: The world in a grove

mod.name: GreenThumb
mod.description: Right click on crops to harvest and auto re-plant them.

mod.name: Hardcore Questing Mode
mod.description: This mod will add Hardcore mode with extra lives. If you use up your lives, your world will be deleted or you will be banned.

mod.name: IndustrialCraft 2
mod.description: Industrial age themed expansion for Minecraft.

mod.name: Infernal Mobs
mod.description: Diablo Style random Enchantments on Entities! Harder fights! More XP and enchanted loot!

mod.name: InfiniBows
mod.description: Removes the need for a single arrow in the inventory when using an 'Infinity I' enchanted bow.

mod.name: Inventory Tweaks
mod.description: Tweaks to inventory handling for ease of use, including sorting and automatic replacement of broken tools or exhausted stacks of items.

mod.name: Iron Chest
mod.description: New chests with larger sizes, with in-place upgrade items.

mod.name: JABBA
mod.description: Jabba (Just Another Better Barrel Attempt) is focused on providing an affordable mass storage block.

mod.name: Lucky Blocks
mod.description: Are you lucky enough?

mod.name: Magical Crops
mod.description: Magical Crops is mod that changes the way you gather and get resources, if you are bored of mining this is a perfect way of keeping your resources high, you can grow most Vanilla items and ores such as Iron ore, Lapis Lazuli and Bones.

mod.name: MalisisCore
mod.description: MalisisCore is a framework dedicated to simplify many processes required during a mod development.

mod.name: MalisisDoors
mod.description: Better doors!

mod.name: Mantle
mod.description: Shared code for Slime Knights mods and others.

mod.name: MineChem
mod.description: Chemical industry in Minecraft!

mod.name: MineFactory Reloaded
mod.description: Automate everything!

mod.name: MmmMmmMmmMmm
mod.description: Provides a test dummy that can be placed in the world. Punch it, kick it, slice it, push it, pop it, twist it,....

mod.name: MachineMuse's Modular Powersuits
mod.description: A mod which adds modular power armor, power tool, and a tinker table to configure them. Uses UniversalElectricty or IC2 for energy.

mod.name: Mr Crayfish Furniture Mod
mod.description: MrCrayfish's Furniture Mod adds over 30 pieces of furniture to your game so you can decorate your house! There is also many functions that each piece of furniture provides, its not simply just for aesthetics.

mod.name: MrTJPCore
mod.description: Core Libraries for ProjectRed.

mod.name: Mystcraft
mod.description: Mystcraft brings elements from the Myst series of games and books to Minecraft, as well as allowing players to actually write and travel to their own Ages.

mod.name: NEI Addons
mod.description: Adds in mod integration into NEI by showing bee breeding information as well as other helpful mod plugins.

mod.name: NEI Integration
mod.description: NEI handlers for all of the mods, one at a time.

mod.name: NEI Plugins Unofficial
mod.description: Adds mod integration into NEI

mod.name: Nether Ores
mod.description: Introduces mineable yet dangerous ores to the Nether

mod.name: NotEnoughItems
mod.description: Allows you to quickly and easily look up recipes and uses for any item in Minecraft included modded items. Also allows easy spawning of items and a range of one click utilities.

mod.name: Numina
mod.description: A common library of useful functions and utilities for dealing with Minecraft's source code.

mod.name: OpenBlocks
mod.description: All the things you never thought you will ever need

mod.name: OpenMods
mod.description: Boring stuff for all that silly Open* mods

mod.name: Optifine
mod.description: This mod adds support for HD textures and a lot of options for better looks and performance. Doubling the FPS is common.

mod.name: Pam's HarvestCraft
mod.description: An absolutely huge farming and food mod.

mod.name: Progressive Automation
mod.description: A mod that adds automation that can be built in the early game and upgraded throughout late game.

mod.name: Project-Red Base
mod.description: Project Red is all about tech. If you love redstone, you'll wonder how you ever lived without it. It allows you to do so many things, and in a lot cleaner and more compact environment then doing them with normal redstone would allow.

mod.name: ProjectRed-Compatibility
mod.description: Project Red is all about tech. If you love redstone, you'll wonder how you ever lived without it. It allows you to do so many things, and in a lot cleaner and more compact environment then doing them with normal redstone would allow.

mod.name: ProjectRed-Transmission
mod.description: Project Red is all about tech. If you love redstone, you'll wonder how you ever lived without it. It allows you to do so many things, and in a lot cleaner and more compact environment then doing them with normal redstone would allow.

mod.name: ProjectRed-Illumination
mod.description: Project Red is all about tech. If you love redstone, you'll wonder how you ever lived without it. It allows you to do so many things, and in a lot cleaner and more compact environment then doing them with normal redstone would allow.

mod.name: ProjectRed-Expansion
mod.description: Project Red is all about tech. If you love redstone, you'll wonder how you ever lived without it. It allows you to do so many things, and in a lot cleaner and more compact environment then doing them with normal redstone would allow.

mod.name: ProjectRed-Exploration
mod.description: Project Red is all about tech. If you love redstone, you'll wonder how you ever lived without it. It allows you to do so many things, and in a lot cleaner and more compact environment then doing them with normal redstone would allow.

mod.name: Railcraft
mod.description: Redefine your rails

mod.name: Random Things
mod.description: Random Things packed into one Mod.

mod.name: Redstone Arsenal
mod.description: Behold the Redstone (Flux) Revolution!

mod.name: Simply Jetpacks
mod.description: Redstone Flux jetpacks and more

mod.name: Special Mobs
mod.description: Adds variants to the vanilla mobs to make them more interesting and challenging.

mod.name: Steve's Factory Manager
mod.description: Steve's Factory Manager is a mod which allows you to set up systems that moves and manages items between inventories and machines

mod.name: Tinkers' Construct
mod.description: A little of this, a little of that, a lot of tinkering, and a lot of tools

mod.name: Thaumcraft
mod.description: Adding a touch of magic to Minecraft

mod.name: Thaumcraft NEI Plugin
mod.description: NEI Integration for Thaumcraft 4.

mod.name: Thaumic Exploration
mod.description: An add-on for Thaumcraft 4.1, adding a variety of content.

mod.name: Thaumic Tinkerer
mod.description: An addon to Thaumcraft 4, implementing new content. This mod is a spiritual successor to Elemental Tinkerer. Researches that come from this mod are prefixed by [TT].

mod.name: Thermal Expansion
mod.description: Expanding Minecraft Thermally - provides new options for automation and processing!

mod.name: Thermal Foundation
mod.description: The foundation of a Thermally enhanced world!

mod.name: TiC Tooltips
mod.description: A simple client-side add-on for Tinkers' Construct that adds relevant stats to all tool part tooltips.

mod.name: Tinkers' Mechworks
mod.authors: Glassmaker, mDiyo, fuj1n, ProgWML6, Sunstrike, Pillbox
mod.description: Place and retract blocks on a larger scale, including 64 blocks with the Extended Drawbridge, different blocks with the Advance Drawbridge.

mod.name: Translocator
mod.description: Translocates stuff!

mod.name: The Twilight Forest
mod.description: An enchanted forest dimension.

mod.name: Waila
mod.description: All your data are belong to us.

mod.name: Waila Harvestability
mod.description: An add-on for Waila that adds information about the harvestability of what you are looking at

mod.name: Wawla
mod.description: Wawla is an addon for the popular information utility mod known as Waila. This mod aims to provide additonal information about the minecraft world around you, and build bridges of compatibility between Waila and other popular mods.

mod.name: Witchery
mod.description: Bringing witchcraft and nature magic to Minecraft: cauldrons, broomsticks, ritual circles, magical brews, a bit of necromancy and voodoo for good measure; all topped off with a fetching pointy hat. Oh, and watch out for the demons...

mod.name: WR-CBE Core
mod.description: Redstone Ether with some component items

mod.name: Zombie Awareness
mod.description: Zombie Awareness via- Low health, light and sound.
